name: Lawrence BELSER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Belser v. Pennsylvania Department of Probation & Parole

parties: Lawrence BELSER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of May, 2011, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED. See Poulson v. Pennsylvania Bd. of Probation and Parole, — Pa. -, 20 A.3d 1178 (2011).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
Lawrence BELSER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 64 EAP 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 24, 2011.
